template_input_params.name: os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the admin user account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH.
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username

template_input_params.name: os_admin_password
template_input_params.description: Operating System Password for the Operating System User to access virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Operating system password

template_input_params.name: os_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Operating System private key for the Operating System User to access virtual machine. The key should be base64 encoded.
template_input_params.label: Operating system private key

template_input_params.name: filebeat_source_url
template_input_params.description: HTTP URL of the filebeat installation package.
template_input_params.label: Filebeat package location

template_input_params.name: filebeat_config_url
template_input_params.description: HTTP URL of the filebeat configuration file. One of Filebeat package location and Monitored paths needs to be specified. Example file names, filebeat-6.2.2-amd64.deb  or filebeat-6.2.2-x86_64.rpm.
template_input_params.label: Filebeat config file location

template_input_params.name: monitored_paths
template_input_params.description: List of files and directories to monitor with logstash. One of Filebeat package location and Monitored paths needs to be specified.
template_input_params.label: Monitored paths
